app.name: Emporix Integration for Zendesk
app.short_description: The Zendesk app for Emporix integrates order information directly into the ticket view, providing agents with access to ordered products, delivery and billing addresses, and order status and date. This enhances the efficiency and accuracy of customer service.
app.long_description: The Zendesk app for Emporix allows customer service agents to view order information directly within the ticket view. With this integration, agents have immediate access to essential order details such as ordered products, delivery and billing addresses, as well as order status and date. This seamless connection between Zendesk and the Emporix e-commerce platform eliminates the need to switch between different systems, offering a comprehensive view of customer orders. Agents can work more efficiently as they have all relevant information at a glance, leading to faster and more accurate responses. This app not only improves the efficiency and accuracy of customer service but also increases customer satisfaction through consistent and informed support.
app.installation_instructions: Enter Emporix authentification data, then click Install:...
app.title: Emporix Integration for Zendesk
